DataListSpec.Name: Interaction Extension UI Model Field Manager Field List Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Displays a list of fields that have been configured for Interaction Extension UI Model forms for a specific Interaction Subcategory
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_UIMODELFIELDMANAGER_FIELDLIST (@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier) as begin set nocount on;
select manager.ID, code.DESCRIPTION as UIMODELFIELD, manager.ISVISIBLE, manager.ISREQUIRED
from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION_UIMODELFIELDMANAGER manager inner join dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSIONUIMODELFIELDCODE code on manager.UIMODELFIELDCODEID = code.ID
where manager.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = @CONTEXTID
end
